let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =

      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

      match h with

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
    | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
    | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  match depth with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | [] -> d
  | h::t -> 
      match h with 
        | (s,n) -> 
            if s = k then n else assoc (d,k,t)
;;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | Half     of expr 
    | ThreeAve of expr * expr * expr

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString e ^ ")"
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString e ^ ")"
  | Average (e1, e2) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (e1, e2) -> exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2
  | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "<" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "?" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ":" ^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
  | Half e -> "(" ^ exprToString e ^ "/2)"
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/3)"
;;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildHalf(e)		   = Half(e)
let buildThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)	   = ThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos(pi *. eval(e,x,y))
  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.
  | Times (e1, e2) -> eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y) then eval(e3,x,y) else eval(e4,x,y)
  | Half e -> eval(e,x,y) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

                                                                                   buildCosine (buildTimes (buildSine (buildCosine
                                                                                                                         (buildY())),buildAverage (buildSine (buildX()), buildTimes
                                                                                                                                                                           (buildX(),buildX()))))))),buildY())))

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  match depth with
    | 0 -> 
        let halff = rand(0,2) in
          if halff = 0 then  buildY()
          else buildX()
    | 1 -> 
        let halff = rand(0,2) in
          if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
          else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
    | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
    | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
    | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
;;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm")) 

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  try f () with ex ->

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | [] -> d
  | h::t -> 
      match h with 
        | (s,n) -> 
            if s = k then n else assoc (d,k,t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | Half     of expr 
    | ThreeAve of expr * expr * expr

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString e ^ ")"
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString e ^ ")"
  | Average (e1, e2) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (e1, e2) -> exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2
  | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "<" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "?" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ":" ^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
  | Half e -> "(" ^ exprToString e ^ "/2)"
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/3)"
;;

let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildHalf(e)		   = Half(e)
let buildThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)	   = ThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos(pi *. eval(e,x,y))
  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.
  | Times (e1, e2) -> eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y) then eval(e3,x,y) else eval(e4,x,y)
  | Half e -> eval(e,x,y) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand(0,4) in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
;;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in

  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

ocaml.min:
let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in

  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1))

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->

        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"

  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->

  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | [] -> d
  | h::t -> 
      match h with 
        | (s,n) -> 
            if s = k then n else assoc (d,k,t)
;;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let helper = f b in
    match helper with
      | (a, b) -> 
          if b then wwhile(f, a) 
          else a

  | Average (e1, e2) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (e1, e2) -> exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2
  | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "<" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "?" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ":" ^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
  | Half e -> "(" ^ exprToString e ^ "/2)"
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/3)"
;;

let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildHalf(e)		   = Half(e)
let buildThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)	   = ThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos(pi *. eval(e,x,y))
  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.
  | Times (e1, e2) -> eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y) then eval(e3,x,y) else eval(e4,x,y)
  | Half e -> eval(e,x,y) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) =

  let s = Random.State.make seed in

let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand(0,4) in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
;;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

ocaml.min:
let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand(0,4) in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) =

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in

    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =

                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in

  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | [] -> d
  | h::t -> 
      match h with 
        | (s,n) -> 
            if s = k then n else assoc (d,k,t)
;;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  let helper = f b in
    match helper with
      | (a, b) -> 
          if b then wwhile(f, a) 
          else a

  | Half e -> "(" ^ exprToString e ^ "/2)"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildHalf(e)		   = Half(e)
let buildThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)	   = ThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos(pi *. eval(e,x,y))
  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.
  | Times (e1, e2) -> eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y) then eval(e3,x,y) else eval(e4,x,y)
  | Half e -> eval(e,x,y) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand(0,4) in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
;;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e -> sin (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos (pi *. (eval (e, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | Half e -> (eval (e, x, y)) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) /. 3.;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | Half of expr
  | ThreeAve of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  let rdm = rand (0, 4) in
  match rdm with
  | 0 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in if halff = 0 then buildY () else buildX ()
  | 1 ->
      let halff = rand (0, 2) in
      if halff = 0
      then Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
      else Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
  | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
  | 4 ->
      Thresh
        ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
          (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))));;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString e2))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | Half e -> "(" ^ ((exprToString e) ^ "/2)")
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/3)")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in
  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

  | h::t -> 
      match h with 
        | (s,n) -> 
            if s = k then n else assoc (d,k,t)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))

  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.

  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand(0,4) in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->

                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | [] -> d
  | h::t -> 
      match h with 
        | (s,n) -> 
            if s = k then n else assoc (d,k,t)
;;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let helper = f b in
    match helper with
      | (a, b) -> 
          if b then wwhile(f, a) 
          else a

    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | Half     of expr

let rec exprToString e = match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString e ^ ")"
  | Cosine e -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString e ^ ")"
  | Average (e1, e2) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (e1, e2) -> exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2
  | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "<" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "?" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ":" ^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
  | Half e -> "(" ^ exprToString e ^ "/2)"
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e2 ^ "+" ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/3)"
;;

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildHalf(e)		   = Half(e)
let buildThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)	   = ThreeAve(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos(pi *. eval(e,x,y))
  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.
  | Times (e1, e2) -> eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y) then eval(e3,x,y) else eval(e4,x,y)
  | Half e -> eval(e,x,y) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand(0,4) in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildHalf(e)		   = Half(e)

let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine e -> sin(pi *. (eval (e,x,y)))
  | Cosine e -> cos(pi *. eval(e,x,y))
  | Average (e1, e2) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.
  | Times (e1, e2) -> eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y)
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y) then eval(e3,x,y) else eval(e4,x,y)
  | Half e -> eval(e,x,y) /. 2.
  | ThreeAve (e1,e2,e3) -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) /. 3.

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
;;

    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = 
            if 
              List.mem h seen then(helper (seen, t)) 
            else 
              h::seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec build (rand, depth) =
  let rdm = rand in
    match rdm with
      | 0 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then  buildY()
            else buildX()
      | 1 -> 
          let halff = rand(0,2) in
            if halff = 0 then Cosine(build(rand, depth-1)) 
            else Sine(build(rand,depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average(build(rand, depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
      | 3 -> Times(build(rand, depth-1), build(rand,depth-1))
      | 4 -> Thresh(build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1),build(rand,depth-1))
;;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)
